thread.title: Alda Gregorio

author: Alda Gregorio
title: Alda Gregorio
text:
I was scammed by an online company Dresslink. I purchase items online and the company never shipped them and tried to keep the money I paid for the items. I posted my negative experience on Trust Pilot and other websites like it and I am certain it helped pressure dresslink into refunding me through paypal. Dresslink has been sendind me emails everyday to remove the reviews I posted on this site and others. Thank you TrustPilot for helping consumers expose scam companies online and helping protect consumer purchases. Your website helped me recover my money. Can't thank you enough will use regularly to post good and bad reviews and to check reviews posted by other consumers.
Sincerely
AG from New Jersey
